MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G21 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Keppochill Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:53pm. Our engineers are on their way to Springburn Road North substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:52pm on 29th March 2021.
